Cookie purpose

Used by google analytics to provide the site owner with analysis of who uses the site, what they are looking for and other information. This allows the site owner to know what people are searching for. This information can be used in the future to improve the site content.

A session that is set by theforburyhotel.co.uk to allow the website to know who you are and differentiate you from differnet users. It doesn't know any personal data such as name, just that you are user "#1234".
This set of cookies is created by using (social media) sharing buttons they allow users to share pages but also allow social media outlets to track users.
These cookies are set as a part of using addthis buttons / cookies.
Further cookies set by facebook itself. These cookies allow facebook facilities such as “like” to function, with the site and specific pages.
In a similar way to facebook, twitter uses cookies to allow its features to work.
Tripadviser is promotes and provides previous visitors feedback on their stay at the hotel.
A social media tool used by facebook / twitter / google+.
Cookies set by the add this button this is another social networking cookie used for like buttons and sharing. Part of the "addthis" set of cookies
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {12254=The Forbury Hotel, 26 The Forbury, Reading, Berkshire, RG1 3EJ | T: 01189 527 770 Sitemap | Privacy Policy | Our Cookie Policy | Terms & Conditions | Website by Cybacat}
textBeforeTable: Here is a detailed list of the cookies we use and what they are used for: You can restrict these cookies, however, the hotel widgets and tools will then not function correctly. Typical information that is stored in our cookies are a unique "tag" that allow the site to remember you and your widget usage data such as when, where and how many people you require a booking for. Our cookies don't store personal information such as your name, address. To make full use of the booking and searching widgets and social networking features, your computer, tablet or mobile phone will need to accept cookies. Cookies are small files written on your computer by a website via your website browser (Internet Explorer, Google Chrome for example). These files are usually harmless and only store snippets of information that can personalise a websites services and appearance and improve interaction with the web site. Theforburyhotel.co.uk provides several hotel booking tools and widgets, some of these use something called cookies. Cookie Policy
textAfterTable: For more details on how to manage cookies you can go to http://www.aboutcookies.org/ offers RELAX Recharge your batteries and enjoy some much deserved his and hers time.
